title: Chelsea FC Women extends with Å koda united kingdom as first Official Back of Shirt Partner
body_text:
Chelsea FC Women extends with koda UK as first Official Back of Shirt Partner
Chelsea FC Women is delighted to announce an extension to our long-term partnership with koda UK, which sees the car manufacturer established as the clubs first Official Back of Shirt Partner.
koda will feature on the back of players shirts at the final games of the 2024/25 season and continue to feature on all match kit for the 2025/26 season and beyond. The partnership renewal extends the collaboration for a third consecutive season, and underlines koda UKs commitment to the womens game having served as the Official Automotive Partner for Chelsea FC Women since January 2024.
The continuation of the partnership comes as Chelsea Women secured a record-breaking sixth consecutive Barclays Womens Super League title and eighth win overall. koda-branded shirts will be worn for the first time this Saturday as the team lifts the trophy in front of a home crowd at Stamford Bridge. koda UK branding will also be in position for the Adobe Womens FA Cup final taking place at Wembley on Sunday 18 May as Chelsea strive for the domestic treble.
The partnership underscores kodas ongoing commitment to supporting the growth of womens football, and more broadly, womens sport. A long-time champion of professional female cycling, koda has partnered with events such as the Tour de France Femmes, while also nurturing emerging talent through its previous Cycling Academy programmes.
In addition to the koda brand being visible on the back of the football shirt, players and staff of Chelsea Women and the Womens Academy will benefit from access to kodas acclaimed all-electric Enyaq range and Kodiaq iV plug-in hybrid model.
koda UK will be at the heart of the team connecting with our fans both in the UK and overseas thanks to its continued title sponsorship of the We Are Chelsea podcast, alongside the release of exclusive player-focused content across Chelsea FC Womens and koda UKs official social media channels. kodas presence will also be visible on matchdays at both Kingsmeadow, and at Stamford Bridge where, in a unique matchday moment, a koda model will lead the team bus into SW6 symbolising the journey shared by both Chelsea FC Women and koda.
Giulia Mazzia, commercial director for Chelsea FC Women, said: We are delighted to extend our partnership with koda UK, a brand that has valued and championed womens sports for years. To welcome them as our first Official Back of Shirt Partner illustrates our collective ambition to innovate and establish new ways to bring partners into the fabric of how we support the business function of the club.
The team at koda UK are committed to helping us connect with our hugely passionate community, both on matchdays at Kingsmeadow and Stamford Bridge but also beyond those moments when digital content offers such value and connection for the wider Chelsea family around the world. Were excited to continue achieving great things together.
Kirsten Stagg, head of marketing at koda UK, said: Were proud to partner with the exceptional Chelsea Women team and look forward to seeing the koda logo displayed proudly on the back of the players shirts.
Its a privilege to partner with an organisation that shares our ambition to deliver best-in-class results in everything they do. Chelsea Women exemplify many of the core values we hold at koda, and were excited to continue championing the team while supporting the growth of the sport.
In addition to sponsoring the Chelsea team, koda has signed five players as brand ambassadors who will be present in digital content, community events and staff engagements.
